title: Lost LP
body: I was in ranked pick my champ and I had Wukong and before the timer went out I decided to go Volibear but apparently it said I left and I lost LP and got a ban for something that wasn't entirely my fault. So why did it kick me out the match instead of staying as Wukong?

replies.body: As *NewGuy101* mentioned, I'm curious if you locked in your champion pick. If you didn't hit that lock-in button before the timer hit 0, it would have kicked you for not selecting a champion before the timer finished.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=rJs2qUaE,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-01-24T02:21:12.068+0000)
>
> As *NewGuy101* mentioned, I'm curious if you locked in your champion pick. If you didn't hit that lock-in button before the timer hit 0, it would have kicked you for not selecting a champion before the timer finished.

I did lock in. That's why I'm confused on this. Even if you, Riot, can't do anything about this that's fine. I just hope this won't be an issue with anyone else.

Yeah, we can't change your LP or anything after the fact, sorry fam! It just sounds like you were either a second too late to get that locked in or there was a hiccup in your connection that prevented the matchmaking servers to see the lock in.
